title: Google offers users option to plug AI mode into their photos, email for more personalized answers
description: By MICHAEL LIEDTKE SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Google is leveraging its artificial intelligence technology to open a new peephole for its dominant search engine to tailor answers that draw upon people’s interests, habits, travel itineraries and photo libraries. The new option rolling out Thursday will give millions of people the option of turning on a […]

title: Microsoft Paint can now make AI coloring books
description: Microsoft is giving Paint and Notepad apps on Windows new artificial intelligence capabilities for editing text and making digital illustrations.
content: Microsoft is giving its Paint and Notepad apps on Windows new AI capabilities for editing text and making digital illustrations. The updates are currently rolling out to Windows Insiders in the Windows 11 Canary and Dev channels, and include features... [1671 chars]

title: China Tells Alibaba, Top Tech Firms to Prep Nvidia H200 Orders
description: Chinese officials have told the country’s largest tech firms including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. they can prepare orders for Nvidia Corp.’s H200 AI chips, suggesting Beijing is close to formally approving imports of components essential to powering artificial intelligence.
content: Chinese officials have told the country’s largest tech firms including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. they can prepare orders for Nvidia Corp.’s H200 AI chips, suggesting Beijing is close to formally approving imports of components essential to powering ... [556 chars]

title: Wall St Week Ahead Fed, big earnings week loom for markets as global tensions muddy outlook
description: Investors who have been consumed by geopolitical turmoil to start the year may switch focus in the coming week to prospects for artificial intelligence-related profits ​and the path for interest rates, with a huge crop of earnings reports and a Federal Reserve meeting on tap.

title: Meet the translation professionals losing their jobs to AI
description: While workers worldwide ponder how artificial intelligence might affect their livelihoods, there’s one sector where that question is no longer hypothetical. Machine translation has reduced the amount of work available to human translators and interpreters, and depressed their earnings.
content: As a rare Irish-language translator, Timothy McKeon enjoyed steady work for European Union institutions for years. But the rise of artificial intelligence tools that can translate text and, increasingly, speech nearly instantly has upended his liveli... [5864 chars]

title: American college faculty warn AI harming students' critical thinking
description: A new survey finds 95% of faculty worry artificial intelligence makes students overly reliant on AI, with 90% saying it decreases critical thinking.
content:

title: Is AI really stealing jobs? New hiring data tells a very different story

title: AI at work: Why it’s helping the boss more than the rest of us
description: Are AI's benefits unevenly distributed? Recent reports and discussions at Davos suggest that artificial intelligence may not be the universal boon as many expected. While some top executives claim it’s boosting efficiency and saving time, many employees paint a far less optimistic picture.
content:
Ever since artificial intelligence began weaving its way into our daily workflows — especially after the 2022 ChatGPT launch — the question of whether artificial intelligence (AI) will replace or empower humans has become the never-ending debate.
